item.title: 债券交易员在日本农村小银行获得独一无二的收益
item.description: 爱媛县是日本西部的一个乡村县，以温泉、柑橘和自行车运动著称。这里还是一些精明的债券交易商的故乡。【原文：Ehime is a rural prefecture in Western Japan best known for hot springs, citrus fruit and cycling. It is also home to some savvy bond traders.】

item.title: 华尔街为特朗普判决后的潜在波动做准备
item.description: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普历史性的有罪判决对华尔街的影响尚未显现。【原文：The impact of former President Donald Trump’s historic guilty verdict has yet to set in on Wall Street.】

item.title: 力拓将在新西兰铝厂继续运营 20 年
item.description: 在达成新的电力供应协议后，力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）的新西兰铝冶炼厂将至少运营到 2044 年。【原文：Rio Tinto Plc will keep its New Zealand aluminum smelter operating until at least 2044 after agreeing new electricity supply agreements.】

item.title: 赫兹正在探索融资方案
item.description: 据知情人士透露，赫兹全球控股公司（Hertz Global Holdings Inc.【原文：Hertz Global Holdings Inc. is exploring options to raise financing weeks after the company’s new chief executive officer pledged to get the company back on track following a failed bet on electric vehicles, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Subway 借贷 33.5 亿美元，完成同类最大证券化项目
item.description: 三明治连锁店 Subway 周四出售了 33.5 亿美元的资产支持债券，以帮助罗克资本集团（Roark Capital Group）为其收购提供资金，这是有史以来同类证券化规模最大的一次。【原文：Sandwich chain Subway sold $3.35 billion of asset-backed bonds on Thursday to help fund its buyout by Roark Capital Group, in what is the largest securitization of its kind on record.】

item.title: 墨西哥巨型贷款公司为可能的再融资谈判聘请顾问
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，墨西哥非银行金融机构 Operadora de Servicios Mega SA 已聘请华利安公司（Houlihan Lokey Inc.【原文：Operadora de Servicios Mega SA, a Mexican non-bank financial institution, has hired Houlihan Lokey Inc. ahead of potential refinancing talks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 肺癌药物在研究中击败 Keytruda 后，Summit 股价飙升
item.description: Summit Therapeutics Inc.股价大涨，因为这家生物技术公司称，在非小细胞肺癌患者中进行的一项晚期试验达到了预期目标。【原文：Summit Therapeutics Inc. shares jumped after the biotech company said a late-stage trial met its goal in patients with non-small cell lung cancer.】

item.title: 加密货币时代来临，Coinbase 交易收入面临压力
item.description: 对于数字资产来说，今年是具有里程碑意义的一年，但数字资产正逐渐进入主流市场，价格波动不再那么剧烈，对许多投资者的主要吸引力正在减弱，并有望动摇Coinbase Global Inc.等交易所最大收入来源的增长。【原文：It’s been a landmark year for digital assets, but a move into the mainstream is making price swings less wild, diminishing a key attraction for many investors and poised to shake up growth of the biggest revenue source for exchanges such as Coinbase Global Inc.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"就可能延续至 2025 年的减产协议开展工作
item.description: 官员们表示，欧佩克+正在加紧进行非正式会谈，旨在本周末最终达成石油减产协议。【原文：OPEC+ is pressing on with informal talks aimed at finalizing an agreement on oil-output cuts this weekend, officials said.】

item.title: 克雷廷斯基称英国皇家邮政需要资金避免 "致命螺旋
item.description: 计划收购英国皇家邮政公司的捷克亿万富翁丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）表示，英国邮政服务需要新的投资才能具有竞争力。【原文：Czech billionaire Daniel Kretinsky, who plans to purchase the company that owns UK’s Royal Mail, says the British postal service needs new investment to be competitive.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯寻求在阿美石油公司股权出售中最多出资 120 亿美元
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯确认计划出售其巨型国有石油公司的股份，这笔交易可为沙特王国筹集多达 448 亿沙特里亚尔（约合 119.5 亿美元）的资金，因为沙特正在寻求资金来支付大规模经济转型计划的费用。【原文：Saudi Arabia confirmed plans to sell shares in its giant state-owned oil company in a deal that could raise as much as 44.8 billion Saudi riyals ($11.95 billion) for the kingdom, as it seeks funds to pay for a massive economic transformation plan.】

item.title: 汇丰银行与加拿大皇家银行的交易颠覆了加拿大的外国投资数据
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行（Royal Bank）收购汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）加拿大分部的交易具有里程碑意义，导致该国 14 年来首次出现外国直接投资下降。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada’s landmark deal to acquire HSBC Holdings Plc’s Canadian division led to the country’s first decrease in foreign direct investment in 14 years.】

item.title: 英伟达和五家科技巨头现在占据了 S&P 500 指数 30% 的份额
item.description: 现在，美国六大公司在 S&P 500 指数中所占的份额比以往任何时候都大。【原文：The six biggest US companies now command a greater share of the S&P 500 Index than ever before.】

item.title: KKR 支持的沿海天然气管道公司准备进行加拿大最大的公司债券交易
item.description: 由 KKR & Co.部分控股的加拿大输油管道公司即将启动该国历史上最大的公司债券交易。【原文：A Canadian pipeline that’s partially owned by KKR & Co. is set to kick off what’s likely to be the biggest corporate bond deal in the country’s history.】

item.title: 雷诺将在中国开发大部分售价低于 20,000 欧元的电动汽车
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，雷诺汽车公司将在中国开发其大部分售价低于20,000欧元（约合21,700美元）的Twingo车型，这是该公司为更快地向市场推出经济型电动汽车而采取的举措之一。【原文：Renault SA will develop much of its sub-€20,000 ($21,700) Twingo in China, part of a push by the manufacturer to bring affordable electric vehicles to the market faster, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯称高利率正在发挥作用
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，他预计今年下半年通胀率将继续下降，并补充说借贷成本上升正在抑制经济。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said he expects inflation to continue falling in the second half of this year, adding that elevated borrowing costs are restraining the economy.】

item.title: 贝宁将在中国干预后允许尼日尔石油运输
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，在中国介入调解西非邻国之间的争端之后，贝宁将允许尼日尔的石油通过其港口运输。【原文：Benin is set to allow oil from Niger to be shipped through its port after China stepped in to mediate a dispute between the neighboring West African nations, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员报告 S&P 500 指数和道琼斯指数的实时定价问题
item.description: 周四上午，S&P 500 指数和道琼斯工业平均指数的实时报价有一个多小时没有打印，直到中午左右才在纽约恢复。【原文：Live pricing for the S&P 500 Index and Dow Jones Industrial Average did not print for more than an hour Thursday morning before resuming around noon in New York.】

item.title: KKR 220 亿欧元意大利电信交易获欧盟无条件批准
item.description: KKR & Co.以 220 亿欧元（约合 238 亿美元）竞购意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）固话网络的交易已提前获得欧盟批准，为这项交易铺平了道路，使这家前电话垄断企业放弃了对其最有价值资产的控制。【原文：KKR & Co. has won early European Union approval for its €22 billion ($23.8 billion) bid for Telecom Italia SpA’s land-line network, paving the way for a deal that sees the ex-phone monopolist cede control of its most valuable asset.】

item.title: Maxeon Solar 因 "持续经营 "警告暴跌 53
item.description: Maxeon 太阳能技术有限公司发布了 "持续经营 "警告，并表示将从第一大股东那里获得近 2 亿美元的投资，随后该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Shares of Maxeon Solar Technologies Ltd. plunged after the manufacturer issued a “going concern” warning and said it will receive almost $200 million in investments from its top shareholder.】

item.title: Neumann 结束收购要约后，WeWork 获准退出破产程序
item.description: WeWork 公司赢得了破产法庭的批准，以摆脱数十亿美元的债务，放弃办公空间组合中无利可图的租约，并留下其联合创始人亚当-诺伊曼（Adam Neumann）的遗产。【原文：WeWork Inc. won bankruptcy court approval to shed billions in debt, drop unprofitable leases from its office workspace portfolio and leave behind the legacy of its co-founder Adam Neumann.】

item.title: 印度金达尔电力公司据称将加入委内瑞拉石油合资企业
item.description: 据熟悉该协议的人士透露，印度金达尔电力有限公司（Jindal Power Ltd.）在获得委内瑞拉最大铁矿石联合企业的运营合同几个月后，将与委内瑞拉国家石油公司合作成立一家原油企业。【原文：India’s Jindal Power Ltd. will partner with Venezuela’s state oil company in a crude venture just months after securing a contract to run the country’s largest iron-ore complex, according to people familiar with the agreement.】

item.description: 消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）朝着收紧购房过程中的收费规则迈出了第一步。【原文：The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau took an initial step toward tightening rules for fees charged in the home-buying process.】

item.title: 华尔街提前通过 T+1 测试，失败交易未见增加
item.description: 周三，美国证券交易无法结算的比例基本保持稳定，华尔街通过了转向更快交易系统的首次重大考验。【原文：The proportion of US securities transactions failing to settle remained largely steady on Wednesday, as Wall Street aced the first major test of its move to a faster trading system.】

item.title: 摩尔多瓦和乌克兰将继续向分离地区输送俄罗斯天然气
item.description: 摩尔多瓦和乌克兰达成了一项非正式协议，在与俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）的过境合同于今年年底到期后，将继续向亲俄飞地德涅斯特河左岸输送天然气。【原文：Moldova and Ukraine reached an informal agreement to keep natural gas flowing to the pro-Russian enclave of Transnistria after a transit contract with Gazprom PJSC expires at the end of the year.】

item.title: 南非央行在大选阴影下维持利率不变
item.description: 南非央行维持借贷成本不变，在该国举行关键选举一天后做出了人们普遍期待的裁决。【原文：South Africa’s central bank left borrowing costs unchanged, delivering the widely expected verdict one day after the nation held pivotal elections.】

item.title: 土耳其加息无虞，消费者仍在推动经济发展
item.description: 今年年初，土耳其的经济增长速度可能会加快，因为消费者推动了经济扩张，而迄今为止，土耳其的经济扩张一直没有受到旨在抑制国内需求的一系列激进加息措施的影响。【原文：Turkey’s economy likely grew faster to start the year, as consumers propel an expansion that’s so far been immune to a series of aggressive interest-rate increases meant to muffle domestic demand.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空在近期事件后增加湍流检测工具
item.description: 在其他航空公司发生两起导致一死数十伤的重大事故后，阿联酋航空正在增加一些工具，帮助航空公司预防极端气流事故。【原文：Emirates is adding tools to help the airline prevent incidents of extreme turbulence, after two high-profile mishaps on other carriers left one dead and dozens injured.】
